text: Curtitoma exquisita is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Mangeliidae.Bouchet, P. (2011). Curtitoma exquisita (Yokoyama, 1926). In: MolluscaBase (2017). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=578699 on 2017-04-15 ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Japan. ==References== * Yokoyama, M. (1926) Fossil shells from Sado. Journal of the Faculty of Science, Imperial University, Tokyo, series 2, 1 (8) : 249–312 ==External links== * Tucker, J.K. 2004 Catalog of recent and fossil turrids (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Zootaxa 682: 1–1295. exquisita
title: Curtitoma exquisita
